Description: Marl pottery jar with flat base, walls expanding to moderate shoulder, inset neck and everted roll-over rim. Two pie crust impressed ‘way-handles’ on shoulder.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 24, pl. xxxiii.44 This pot is Wavy handled W43G in in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric pottery. Marked H132a on base.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 17 Jan 2003. Internal loan, Oriental Antiquities, Addis Gallery.
